review: Not as many apps as on Roko
author: Andrew Thompson

review: I just bought my Fire TV stick and it's wonderful! It makes my TV a smart TV without installation hassle.I love that I can start streaming these good shows and movies anytime.
author: Tama Walker

review: Its okay. I want more access to content. Maybe add some more apps to say CW, Comedy Central, Discovery, and others. Its not Amazons fault but more access would bring in more Prime subscribers. The stick loads content fast and Amazon Prime content in HD is crystal clear. The remote could use a light button feature for night time TV watching.
author: hdgriller

review: Great picture and sound, some very good prime assortment show and movies. My only gripe is it would be nice especially with prime that you get a small discount on movies to rent or buy. Other than that I love this thing!
author: Dave

review: The Fire TV Stick is a fantastic little entertainment addition to my Samsung TV! It streams Netflix with ease and I set it up to play all my media from my local NAS.  Easy to setup and just works!
author: sgp-shopper

review: its trash I want my money back
author: JOSE VELEZ

review: Love this gadget!!!  I'm not a techy person, but thankfully this Fire Stick is very user friendly.  Now I have access to my favorite Netflix & Amazon shows on my "non" smart TV as well! :)
author: AngieinCorona

review: Very easy to set up. Did need to use the optional extender for wifi.  Throughly enjoying all the options from Prime, Netflix and more.
author: Lea
